title: Aquatics
text:
Long-term patterns
Here we look at some long term patterns in the median scores across all models. Are some months more predictable than others? Note that logs score penalties for observations that fall outside expected ranges are much higher than CRPS penalties.

title: Weather
text: As a reference case, we can compare the NOAA Global Ensemble Forecast System (GEFS) predictions to measurements made on the ground at individual NEON sites using the EFI standard and cyberinfrastructure tools. Keep in mind these are not the usual NOAA forecasts you see in daily life, GEFS are: 31 ensemble models at 1.0 degree lat/long squares resolution that extend a full 30 days in the future. We sample these at the NEON sites and compare to NEON measurements.
